name: Backrooms VR
description:
The Backrooms, a shadowed area caught past the fringes of reality. These labyrinthine hallways are patrolled by demonic forces, keeping whoever they find trapped within those halls, not letting a single soul slip past their grasp. Your mission is to collect 7 papers scattered around the Backrooms and do your best to escape, but don't get too lost. You may just find yourself face to face with an unsavory individual...

Latest Update: Bugfixes and Oculus Quest VR Support! An update so large it deserves a new page
